name: Imagegallery
tagline: Access all images from folder.No use of DB
body:
Image gallery a way to access all image from folder using php.
Feel free to use as there is no database need to extract images.
It's contain MIT Licence.I found image gallery and another script of access images from folder as simple, I have combined both  with upload function that makes it simple and useful as well.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
